remarks: Rule used to change the bound variable in a restricted universal quantifier with implicit substitution which also changes the quantifier domain.  (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
statement:
cbvralv2.1 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
cbvralv2.2 $e |- ( x = y -> A = B ) $.
cbvralv2 $p |- ( A. x e. A ps <-> A. y e. B ch ) $.
$d A y $.
$d B x $.
$d ch x $.
$d ps y $.
